properties.name: dashboardName
properties.description: Allows to have customized dashboard context name in case the CockpitDashboardModule is used in different apps and should have individual home dashboards per app
properties.rawdescription: Allows to have customized dashboard context name in case the CockpitDashboardModule is used in different apps and should have individual home dashboards per app

properties.name: defaultWidgets
properties.description: Allows to define the default widgets shown on the Cockpit Homepage
properties.rawdescription: Allows to define the default widgets shown on the Cockpit Homepage

properties.name: pageTitle
properties.description: Allows to have a different page title than the default 'Home'
properties.rawdescription: Allows to have a different page title than the default 'Home'

properties.name: userSpecific
properties.description: Allows to have individual home dashboards per user
properties.rawdescription: Allows to have individual home dashboards per user
